name: CanCan the Game
description:
CanCan is a puzzle-building game using square two-color tiles on a black gameboard. CanCan is all about color. Tiles are placed edge to edge by matching and touching color. Black and white tiles are WILD. Match shapes too and you get rewards. Change your grid size, create your own palettes. You win by building good relationships! Everyone is an artist. Play now!

You can also find CanCan the Game for your mobile devices at Google Play and the Apple App Store!
